name: v1_city
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool city_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get useful statistics on tens of thousands of cities around the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/city.
API description: Fetches city data from the API Ninjas City API endpoint with various filtering criteria.

country.description: Country filter. Must be an ISO-3166 alpha-2 code (default is 'US').

name.description: Name of the city to search for (default is 'New York').

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.
